product_overview: A Java Spring Boot backend service that converts integer numeric input into their textual representation in supported languages (FR, EN, ES) via a simple REST API endpoint.
core_goals: Provide accurate, language-specific textual representations of integer numbers (French, English, Spanish).
Expose a simple, stateless REST API for integration with client applications.
Support large numeric ranges up to the implemented language rules (trillions/billions where applicable).
Be extensible so new languages can be added with minimal changes to configuration and language factory.

features.name: Number to Text Conversion API
features.description: Convert a numeric path parameter into its written text form for a specified language (FR, EN, ES) using GET /T1.0/amounts/{langue}/value/{value}. No authentication required.
user_flows: GET /T1.0/amounts/EN/value/123 -> Receive 200 with JSON {"message":"One hundred and twenty-three","langue":"EN","input":"123"}
GET /T1.0/amounts/XX/value/45 -> Receive 200 with JSON {"message":"Quarante-cinq","langue":"FR","input":"45"}  // Unsupported language code falls back to FR
GET /T1.0/amounts/EN/value/12A3 -> Receive 400 with JSON {"error":"Invalid numeric value","input":"12A3"}  // Non-numeric input error
GET /T1.0/amounts/EN/value/999999999999999999999 -> Receive 400 with JSON {"error":"Value out of supported range","input":"999999999999999999999"}  // Exceeds implemented numeric range
GET /T1.0/amounts/EN/value/123 -> Receive 500 with JSON {"error":"Internal server error"}  // Example server error path
